metadata.synopsis: Mizora appears in camp at night to Avatar Wyll to remind him of his goal: kill Karlach
metadata.how_to_trigger: Play avatar Wyll. Sleep several nights after nautiloid crash.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: Mizora. I'm surprised it took you this long to stop by.
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: A diabolical circle is drawn on the ground behind Wyll. A devilish figure rises from it and spreads her wings wide. It is Mizora, the cambion whoholds Wyll's soul-pact.

34.text: Mizora. I'm surprised it took you this long to stop by.
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: A diabolical circle is drawn on the ground behind Wyll. A devilish figure rises from it and spreads her wings wide. It is Mizora, the cambion whoholds Wyll's soul-pact.

72.speaker: Player
72.text: Mizora. I'm surprised it took you this long to stop by.
72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora sinks back though her circle and Wyll sits, looking ahead, as the scene fades.

9.speaker: Player
9.text: Hells - a devil. This must be a bad dream...
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora sinks back though her circle and Wyll sits, looking ahead, as the scene fades.

22.speaker: Player
22.text: Remind me - what should I be doing?
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora sinks back though her circle and Wyll sits, looking ahead, as the scene fades.

21.speaker: Player
21.text: She's still in the Hells. I need to get back there.
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora sinks back though her circle and Wyll sits, looking ahead, as the scene fades.

60.speaker: Player
60.text: I don't care about the deal. I just want this thing out of my head.
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora sinks back though her circle and Wyll sits, looking ahead, as the scene fades.

57.speaker: Player
57.text: I know the terms of our bargain. I'll find Karlach and kill her.
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora sinks back though her circle and Wyll sits, looking ahead, as the scene fades.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: The Sword Coast is in danger. I'll send this damned fiend back to the Hells.
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora sinks back though her circle and Wyll sits, looking ahead, as the scene fades.

68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora sinks back though her circle and Wyll sits, looking ahead, as the scene fades.

51.speaker: Player
51.text: I have bigger problems now, if you haven't noticed.

10.speaker: Player
10.text: You can shove the deal up your own arse.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: What do you know - I was just thinking about you.

58.speaker: Narrator
58.text: *It is a fitful night, haunted by the bitter memories of the past.*
58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll tosses and turns in his sleeping bag.

12.speaker: Narrator
12.text: *Memories of your father - Grand Duke Ulder Ravengard - and his diplomatic mission to Elturel. Memories of the diabolical bargain you made to save Baldur's Gate in his absence...*
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: A diabolical circle is drawn on the ground behind Wyll. A devilish figure rises from it and spreads her wings wide. It is Mizora, the cambion whoholds Wyll's soul-pact.

64.speaker: Narrator
64.text: *...Memories of your father casting you, his Hells-touched son, out of your beloved city.*
64.context: CinematicNodeContext: A diabolical circle is drawn on the ground behind Wyll. A devilish figure rises from it and spreads her wings wide. It is Mizora, the cambion whoholds Wyll's soul-pact.

36.text: My poor little pupster. A free trip on a mind flayer machine, and all you've got is a brain-bug to show for it.
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: A diabolical circle is drawn on the ground behind Wyll. A devilish figure rises from it and spreads her wings wide. It is Mizora, the cambion whoholds Wyll's soul-pact.

59.text: My poor little pupster. A free trip on a mind flayer machine, and all you've got is a brain-bug to show for it.
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll sits up, facing Mizora. He remains seated, speaking to Mizora throughout.

43.text: My poor little pupster. A free trip on a mind flayer machine, and all you've got is a brain-bug to show for it.
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora looks around, pleased with what she sees.

20.speaker: Mizora
20.text: My poor little pupster. A free trip on a mind flayer machine, and all you've got is a brain-bug to show for it.
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora looks around, pleased with what she sees.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: Mizora. I'm surprised it took you this long to stop by.
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora looks around, pleased with what she sees.

37.speaker: Mizora
37.text: Come knocking before you've settled in? I may be half-devil - but I'm no monster.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Hells - a devil. This must be a bad dream...
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora looks around, pleased with what she sees.

4.speaker: Mizora
4.text: Half-devil, hon - and I'm no dream. But if I were, I'd be the baddest.
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora looks around, pleased with what she sees.

38.speaker: Mizora
38.text: Sweet spot you've found for yourself. But I wouldn't get too cosy. After all, we've got a deal.
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora looks around, pleased with what she sees.

42.speaker: Narrator
42.text: *Another memory seizes your mind. You race through the burning wastes of Avernus.*

17.speaker: Narrator
17.text: *Just ahead, the diabolical figure called Karlach cuts through demonic invaders, her single horn blazing in flame. You are the hunter, and she is your prey.*

46.speaker: Player
46.text: Remind me - what should I be doing?

70.speaker: Mizora
70.text: Killing the fiend known as Karlach. She's been a thorn in the archdevil Zariel's side.

32.speaker: Mizora
32.text: But she's not just the Hells' problem now. She fled Avernus on the same ship you hitched a ride on.

26.speaker: Player
26.text: She's still in the Hells. I need to get back there.

11.speaker: Mizora
11.text: Karlach's not just the Hells' problem now. She fled Avernus on the same ship you hitched a ride on.

52.speaker: Mizora
52.text: Wild little thing. You don't find her and cut her down, she'll burn the whole Coast to ash.

33.speaker: Mizora
33.text: And I know the famed Blade of Frontiers would never stand for that.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: I know the terms of our bargain. I'll find Karlach and kill her.
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora sinks back though her circle and Wyll sits, looking ahead, as the scene fades.

45.speaker: Mizora
45.text: Obedient thing - I love to see it.

49.speaker: Player
49.text: The Sword Coast is in danger. I'll send this damned fiend back to the Hells.
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora sinks back though her circle and Wyll sits, looking ahead, as the scene fades.

8.speaker: Mizora
8.text: That's the spirit. Go get her, tiger.
8.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora sinks back though her circle and Wyll sits, looking ahead, as the scene fades.

67.speaker: Mizora
67.text: Good boys get treats. Bad boys? Well - let's not think about that 'til we need to.
67.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora sinks back though her circle and Wyll sits, looking ahead, as the scene fades.

50.speaker: Mizora
50.text: Be a good boy. Bring me her head for dessert - I've a sweet tooth, and devil's on the menu.
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora sinks back though her circle and Wyll sits, looking ahead, as the scene fades.

47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora sinks back though her circle and Wyll sits, looking ahead, as the scene fades.

24.speaker: Player
24.text: I have bigger problems now, if you haven't noticed.

61.speaker: Mizora
61.text: I won't lie, pet - you drew a lousy hand. But folding's not an option when your soul's on the line.

15.speaker: Player
15.text: You can shove the deal up your own arse.

53.speaker: Mizora
53.text: Yelp all you want - you belong to the Hells.

69.speaker: Player
69.text: I don't care about the deal. I just want this thing out of my head.

48.speaker: Mizora
48.text: Karlach's fled Avernus on the same ship you hitched a ride on.

35.speaker: Player
35.text: What do you know - I was just thinking about you.

55.speaker: Mizora
55.text: You missed me? How sweet. The best bloodhounds are always the most loyal.
